wordRoot.title: alright
wordRoot.html:
“all right”是常见的拼写方式，可以在1884年的印刷品中找到证据。

There are no such forms as all-right, or allright, or alright, though even the last, if seldom allowed by the compositors to appear in print, is often seen ... in MS. [Fowler]
“all-right”、“allright”或“alright”这些形式并不存在，尽管即使是最后一个，如果排版工人不经常允许它出现在印刷品中，也经常在手稿中看到...[福勒]

relate.title: allright
relate.html: 请看 alright。
